page.title: 13RELIGION CTD.
page.content:
Approximately 200 people attend the Methodist Church each week and there are midweek meetings as well. People at the Methodist Church are sending money to help the people affected by The Famine in Ethiopia. The Minister at the church says that his favourite story in the Bible is the Prodigal Son because it says Jesus will forgive us whatever we do. There is a small Catholic Church that has a service once a fortnight, but most Catholics go into Hinckley to church. The Congregational Church has two services on a Sunday and a Sunday School. In addition there are coffee mornings and other weekly activities.
The research for this work was done by a group of 14 year olds.
